aws_apigatewayv2_authorizer.subcategory: API Gateway v2 (WebSocket and HTTP APIs)
aws_apigatewayv2_authorizer.description: Manages an Amazon API Gateway Version 2 authorizer.

identity_sources.description: The identity sources for which authorization is requested.

authorizer_credentials_arn.description: The required credentials as an IAM role for API Gateway to invoke the authorizer.

jwt_configuration.description: The configuration of a JWT authorizer. Required for the `JWT` authorizer type.

audience.description: A list of the intended recipients of the JWT. A valid JWT must provide an aud that matches at least one entry in this list.

issuer.description: The base domain of the identity provider that issues JSON Web Tokens, such as the `endpoint` attribute of the [`aws_cognito_user_pool`](/docs/providers/aws/r/cognito_user_pool.html
